numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the acceptance rate at Ivy League schools is higher for students whose parents have a higher income than for students whose parents have a lower income.
2. I wonder how many students of each income group apply to Ivy League schools.
3. I wonder whether all applicants have similar high school educations.
4. I wonder how this graph would look in other countries.
5. In some other countries, colleges are more affordable.
6. At my school, students have different income levels.
7. At my school, these students get the same education.
8. The headline is: Are the costs of college preventing students from applying to Ivy League schools?
